name: Gordon Ramsay
cookingProcess: Soak the rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes.Heat the vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and stir-fry for 10 seconds. Add the shrimp and stir-fry until pink, about 2-3 minutes.Push the shrimp to one side of the wok and crack in the eggs. Scramble the eggs until cooked through, then mix with the shrimp. Drain the rice noodles and add to the wok. Stir-fry for 1-2 minutes. Add the roasted peanuts, bean sprouts, and green onions. Stir-fry for another 1-2 minutes.In a small bowl, whisk together the fish sauce, tamarind paste, brown sugar, and cayenne pepper. Add to the wok and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes.Serve hot with lime wedges.
